title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area.
EB: Expect StyledText to efficiently handle text changes in word wrap mode, minimizing unnecessary redraws to improve performance.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Enable word wrap mode in StyledText.
2. Append N lines of text to the StyledText.
3. Observe the entire client area being redrawn N times.
Additional information: Add the following line to StyledText's performPaint method to log redraw details - System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
